title.narrative: Building Disaster Resilient Communities in Coastal Vietnam

description.narrative: Reducing impact of natural disaster in 42 coastal communities through Intergenerational Self-Help Clubs via DRR (Disaster Risk Reduction) and CCA (Climate Change Adaptation) interventions

participating-org.narrative: OFDA - Office of US Foreign Disaster Assistance

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
